A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A truly great movie in many ways. I really enjoyed the deep psychology and the emotional depth. Also I felt that The Last Jedi had the intention not to be a super traditional SW-movie\, but it tried to blend in both new and old stuff and it worked quite good. The journey and complexity of Kylo Ren a.k.a Ben Solo was one of the strongest elements of the movie in my experience. The battle he's in and tries to win is really interesting. I am very excited where his story and the saga as a whole will go to next.
